description:
The Mayo Clinic app is an easy-to-use mobile app that allows users the ability to actively manage their health as a Mayo Clinic patient. 

Through the Mayo Clinic app patients can access their personal medical record, appointment schedule, or contact their care team through secure messaging.  At the user’s discretion, the app also allows users to share certain data from their medical record with the Health app, allowing users of the Mayo Clinic app to be fully in charge of their personal health data. 

The Mayo Clinic app offers improved features to help patients:
•      View lab results in real time as soon as your doctor sees them.
•	Communicate directly with your care team through secure messaging.
•	View and manage details of your appointment schedule, such as requesting an appointment.
•	View Mayo Clinic educational videos from your phone or tablet.
•	View Mayo Clinic health data through your Health app dashboard.
releaseNotes: Rebranded as Mayo Clinic app with a new app icon and an all new user experience optimized for iOS 7 and iOS 8.  We've included Integration with Health to share data to and from Mayo Clinic. We've streamlined navigation to the most important features of the application making it easier than ever to access your health record information, request an appointment and contact your care team.
